!Nameless Spirit: Yes, thank you! Now I'll help you and your friends pass through the force field. By the way, where are your friends? Surely you don't intend to take Frintezza on all by yourself, do you? You should take *up to four parties* with you. Frintezza's evil power won't be easily defeated! *More than 5 parties cannot enter due to the size of the space*. You and your friends will need a *magic scroll that can temporarily disable the force field* so you can pass through. Since you got the password, creating the scroll should be no problem! That is, unless... [Quest _654_JourneytoaSettlement printessa_spirit_q0654_04.htm|"Unless...?"]
